thread.section_title: Paramount Hotel Times Square New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great find
thread.title_full: Great find - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: clive j
title: Great find
text: I booked this hotel through the travel agents . Must admit I hadn't read the reviews before booking . After booking I started to read the reviews and was starting to think about changing my hotel . So glad I didn't . People are saying the rooms are small . Well there was two of us in our room and there was plenty of room and space to put 4 cases . The location of the hotel is superb . I would definitely stay here again when I return to New York . Visited march 15th -18th
